Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Issue: Credit monitoring or identity theft protection services
text:
I want to protect my families credit. 
i being the head of household should be informed and in control of all credit requests. 
how this is not tied to my email or cell phone number is beyond ridiculous. 

lets get into this century. 
if i want to access my bank account i need a username/password and then you need to have my PHONE with a 2step verification password. 

but to open a new credit account in my name you need just some basic data ... .and then i may need to prove that i did n't open it? 

equifax breech shows you that its time to modernize your system of allowing credit based on nominal information that can be easily scraped and hacked. 

how is it allowed that people could open credit on my behalf without contacting me directly using verified contact/adress/phone/email methods? i understand that not everyone is so savvy but let me enroll in 2step as i want to actively monitor and secure my credit. not let it passively be passed around. 


its ludicrous. 
now i need to monitor my credit or freeze my credit and then pay to unfreeze? 
thats how i make sure i 'm secure? 
or pay someone else to do so? 


this is bull. 
figure it out.

Tidewater Finance Company, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX, VA XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX-XXXX This creditor has reported on my XXXX credit report as an open account since XXXX. This information is incorrect. The amount owed has since been charged off and included in an open judgement with their attorney. 

XXXX & XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX # XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX, FL XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX-XXXX

Product: Money transfer, virtual currency, or money service
text:
Paypal is a horrible website to use, and a horrid service to use!! It has so many issues with their website which include practically everything that they offer!! They shoud be fined and investigated to the fullest extent of the law!! 
Their horrible website will not even let me change the linked credit cards I have, which include my checking accouont debit card. I do not want that linked to paypal ever again!! 
And their website wont let me take out my debit card number!! 
And when I called, they cant even find my account??????????????????????????? 
They are FRAUDULENT, and better be investigated, I have been using paypal forever. 
And when I ordered 3 items from XXXX they all went to some fraudulent address in XXXX, NY!!!! I live in PA!!!! 
They refuse to help with this, they wont give me a credit, and they advertiste a buyer protection!! Yeah, right!! I want a full credit, plus they have to pay for overnight charges so I receive these items now!! 
There are seveal issues with them, they are horrible, and you better intestigate their horrid website, they even told me several times that it doesnt work, and their having issues.

I have a home mortgage with Provident Funding and we have repeatedly run into issues with poor service and process requirements which are a detriment to their customers. 

My most recent issue : My home received wind damage to the roof from a thunderstorm. I received a claim check in the amount of $ XXXX from my insurance company made out to me and Provident Funding. I sent the check to Provident for endorsement. First, they deposited the check in their own account rather than endorsing it and sending to me. Provident then held funds for 5 days.. After which they issued a check to me AND the roofing contractor. This now forces me to only work with that roofing contractor for the full amount. I am unable to withhold funds if there are issues that I want the contractor to resolve before full payment. 

I called Provident Funding customer service. The customer service agent said that issuing to the contractor was a requirement of their investor, XXXX XXXX. I asked them to send me documentation of those requirements and they refused. ( " We do not email our customers, even at their request. '' ) I then reviewed the posted guidelines from XXXX XXXX online and the guidelines do NOT require this. I raised the issue to the customer service manager, XXXX, and he acknowledged that the current guidelines do not require this. However, he then claimed that the posted guidelines were " new '' and Provident was not required to follow those guidelines for another month.. Since we both agreed these were the current guidelines, I asked them to re-issue my check per the guidance from XXXX XXXX. He said that regardless of the current guidelines, Provident was not required and so, NO, they would not. He made no apology for their delay in following the guidelines. 

My complaints : - Provident provided me with false information about current guidelines. They only acknowledged the error when I researched and pointed it out to them. 
- Provident is intentionally delaying their adoption of the current guidelines for their own profit at the expense of consumers. They are doing this by holding claim money longer than needed so that they can collect interest which is not rightfully theirs. 
- The attitude from their customer service manager was poor. 
- They refused to provide me anything in writing to back up their claims. They told me to " XXXX it '' myself.
Company public response: Company believes it acted appropriately as authorized by contract or law

Issue: Cont'd attempts collect debt not owed
text: Midland Funding called me attempting to collect a debt they say I owe. I tried to convince the lady they have the wrong person but she ignored me completely acting as if I 'm lying.. I finally hung up because she kept asking for my social security number and phone number. I told her since they called me she should already have my information. I figured it was a bogus phone call but then today I was notified they placed a Collection on my Credit report. I ca n't understand how companies can do this with NO proof of any kind.

text: My chase card account was used fraudulently and it was deleted of my credit report and now its showing charged off witch still affects me. My chase card balance Should not have been sent to collections and charged off when there was fraudulent transactions and activity done with out my permission or my knowledge and I want the chase card bank to clear me from the debt. I should not be held responsible to pay off a account that I did not use. Most transactions were canceled but I never received the return payment after cancellation was processed.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Sub-issue: Credit inquiries on your report that you don't recognize
text: On XX/XX/2019 I went to look at new vehicles at XXXX XXXX in XXXX, TX. I gave the salesman my ID in order to drive a vehicle, but ended up not driving the vehicle after I realized he gave me false information over the phone. About 4 hours after I left the dealership I started getting notifications from credit bureaus that someone ran my credit at the dealership. I never filled out any paper work, never signed anything. In fact, I expressed my displeasure regarding the false information and told them I had no desire to purchase a vehicle from them. So, they ran my credit based on my Drivers License information. I know this because they used the address that was on the DL and it wasn't my current address. They ran it through Ally Financial, XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX. I just built a new house and didn't update it yet. I contacted the dealership the next day and they claimed to have mixed up my information with someone else and said they'd submit all the paper work to correct the issue. I've got 10 or so emails from the 'Sales Director ' ( XXXX XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX ) stating he was taking care of it and he'd follow up. He hasn't followed up any and nothing has been done. I tried submitting disputes to the credit bureau 's, to no avail. This company is extremely dishonest and down right shady! They ran my credit to see if they could make me a good deal on a car, thinking that I'd buy one. Never do business with this company.
Company public response: Company has responded to the consumer and the CFPB and chooses not to provide a public response

In response to a prior complaint filed with CFPB, they provided an accounting stating that this validates the debt ( see attachment " RS Clark XXXX '' ). It does not meet the requirements under the law and does not validate the debt. Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
text:
This complaint is regarding closed XXXX XXXX account no.XXXX. 
It has been disputed twice yet it comes back verified or updated from all 3 credit bureaus. 
Sometime ago I spoke with a XXXX  XXXX employee in XXXX even though I am quite fluent and educated in English.The gist of the conversation was that I had a card that had been fraudulently used by others or skimmed.Per the conversation, the card was closed and the debt was paid by XXXX  XXXX and another card was to be re-issued and mailed. 
Instead the card did not arrive and my credit was damaged as if I had been the thief or fraudster.Instead my otherwise unflawed credit has been and continues to be damaged by this illegal fraudulent credit reporting regardless of credit bureau disputes.This grievous unconscionable behavior not only damages me but also the known forthright founder XXXX XXXX, CEO who built a small company into a the 10th largest bank in America.I 'm sending him a copy of this. 
I myself am wealthy, all properties owned outright, a large income until death and my children won't have to work as hard as I did.I 'm fighting XXXX and trying to get my family ready.I have to deal with your errors because the world requires it.If my wife 's credit was not good I might be in trouble with endless treatments to beat the XXXX which I shall.But, I will not permit XXXX  XXXX to harm me without a fight.Do not call me I will be on vacation for two weeks.Send a fraud statement if you must, I'll sign with notary.
Company public response: Company has responded to the consumer and the CFPB and chooses not to provide a public response

text: I am currently making payments to Automobile Acceptance Corporation. After falling 31 days behind on my payments the unit was placed out for repo. Prior to this occurring their represents called my phone 3 times a day even after I told them when I would be able to make my payment. They even sent emails to a family member regarding my loan They called after I made arrangements. They also contacted my relatives everyday. After the vehicle was place out for repo, a representative contacted my cousin and refused to identify himself. He made threatening statements which included that Automobile Acceptance Corporation is seeking a warrant for my arrest. They disclosed my personal information withour verify who she really was and threaten to take me to jail over a debt. I contacted Automobile acceptance and the rep refused to let me speak with a supervisor. They kept transferring me to the repo department which never answered the phone. The line would go straight to a voicemail. I called back and advised the rep that I just needed my account number to make a payment. I was told that they could not give me teh account number unless I spoke with someone in the repo department ( whom never picked up the phone ). I am filing a complaint for disclosing my personal information, making threats to jail me for a debt and refusing to allow me to make a payment.
Company public response: Company believes it acted appropriately as authorized by contract or law

text:
XX/XX/XXXX TransUnion XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, IL XXXX RE : UNAUTHORIZED INQUIRY To Whom It May Concern : I reviewed a copy of my credit report and Tranunion ran an unauthorized credit inquiry on me on XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX.
I never authorized such action and this constitutes a violation of my rights under the Fair Credit Reporting Act 604 as well as a violation of my rights to privacy. Please contact XXXX XXXX/XXXX and investigate such occurrence.
I am requesting an updated copy of my credit report, which should be sent to the address listed below. According to the provisions of 612 [ 15 USC 1681j ], there should be no charge for this report. In addition, as part of your investigation, please send the names, business address and phone numbers of those who made unauthorized credit inquiries so I may contact them directly as well as the sign agreement for the inquiry.
If you have any questions or need additional information, please contact me at address listed below.
Thank you.
Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, IA XXXX Social Security # XXXX

text:
I have contacted Equifax on multiple occasions to remove inquiries on my report that were not authorized by me. The statutes are referenced in my attached letter. 

I want the inquiries removed from my credit report.

This started as a billing error at the hospital. I went to see XXXX XXXX XXXXbecause I literally felt like XXXX. My Uncle had recently been hospitalized for XXXX XXXX and I had been to visit him at the same time he contracted the virus. I fell illshortly after and went to my primary care because I was afraid I had it too. 
XXXX XXXX coded this visit with him as a " routine visit ''. My husband is a XXXX veteran and I have XXXX insurance. XXXX denied the claim becausethey told me the claim was coded wrong. I informed the hospital. Not only did I bring acopy of my explanation of benefits to them in person, but I made over 10 calls to variousoffices trying to get them to code the visit properly. This was anything but a " routine visit ''. 
Feeling like I have west nile virus is not a " routine '' thing. 
The hospital and XXXX XXXX 's office sometimes were polite about the matter. They evenclaimed two times they changed it, but they kept submitting the same medical code toXXXX who kept denying the claim because they do not cover " routine visit '' claims. 
Then I got a nasty call from a collections lady saying this would be going to collections. Afew months later I got a letter from " The Credit Bureau of XXXX XXXX XXXX and XXXX Counties ''. The letter is dated XXXX/XXXX/2015 and it says I have 45 days to pay in full orthey will report this to the Credit Reporting Agencies. 
I do not owe this amount. This is a billing error. The hospital has failed repetedly to correcttheir mistakes. They even told me in person it was a mistake and that they would fix it. Thishas been dragging out for almost a year now. I want this to end and for them to bill myinsurance properly. This is no way to treat the wife of an honorably serving XXXX veteran.
Company public response: Company believes it acted appropriately as authorized by contract or law
Company: Credit Bureau of San Luis Obispo & Santa Barbara Counties

Issue: Cont'd attempts collect debt not owed
text: I made a payment and satisfied a credit card debt in XXXX of 2015. I Never received a letter stating that it was paid. I just realized it is still showing up on my credit report as not paid so I called them and asked them if they could send a letter out that I paid it. They acknowledged that I did pay it but refuse to send a letter. They said that all their letters are approved by their legal counsel and they 're not allowed to send letters stating the debt was paid on a certain date. They only sent a letter stating that I do not owe anything but it has the date the letter was sent not when I actually paid it. So if I send this to the credit bureaus they would think I just paid it when in fact I paid it almost a year ago. This will prevent the account from dropping off my credit report for an extra 11 months.
